    Nazli Goharian

    Bio

    I am a Clinical Professor in the Computer Science Department at Georgetown University, and also the associate director of the Information Retrieval Lab (IRLab).

    Research

    My research spans the domains of information retrieval, text mining, and natural language processing. Some topics of interest to me are:

    • Information retrieval models
    • Social media mining and analysis
    • Document summarization
    • Scientific text understanding
    • Health-related text understanding
    • Medical information retrieval
    • Information extraction
    • Neural information retrieval

    Please see the list of the IRLab’s publications and projects for more details.
